ThingDef.Name: NBF_ThingBaseFox
ThingDef.label: Hello :) This label is simply a placeholder text for whatever future things I plan to add.

ThingDef.description: A small canine that seems to have developed a demonlike appearance. Luciferium shards are growing from its skin.
ThingDef.label: demon fox

ThingDef.description: A small faux-furred metal canine. Although friendly, they have incredibly sharp metal claws that can cause horrific wounds.
ThingDef.label: robot fox

ThingDef.description: A small, beautiful canine. These foxes think of themselves as royalty, and take their sweet time living life.
ThingDef.label: beautiful fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine with boiling pouches of chemfuel covering its body. It seems to be enjoying itself.
ThingDef.label: chemfuel fox

ThingDef.description: A small... Chicken? It's a big chicken but the size of a fox.
ThingDef.label: chicken fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine with a soft cream-colored fur. The milk it produces has medicinal properties and works effectively as a herbal medicine substitute.
ThingDef.label: cream fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine with very soft, and very pink fur. These little foxes bring joy to anyone nearby.
ThingDef.label: cute fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine that has a dark purple fur. They smell like a rotting corpse, and are known to produce fully formed human skulls.
ThingDef.label: dark fox

ThingDef.description: A somewhat-large canine that has wings and is covered in scales. Fast and strong, this fox is something to be worried about. It can also breathe fire.
ThingDef.label: dragon fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine with no fur at all. It produces fully formed hearts from its rear when fertilized and lungs when unfertilized.
ThingDef.label: flesh fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine capable of hosting its own ecosystem on its back, complete with miniature creatures. Who knows, maybe one day humans will evolve on one's back. Gaia foxes produce grass every other day and don't require food.
ThingDef.label: gaia fox

ThingDef.description: A small insect that has the head of a megaspider and the body of a fox. It can be milked for insect jelly.
ThingDef.label: insect fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine covered in gray mushrooms. It's sort of off-putting, but it seems happy enough.
ThingDef.label: mushroom fox

ThingDef.description: A small canine covered in rice sprouts.
ThingDef.label: rice fox

ThingDef.description: A metal canine that is entirely made of explosive powder and shell casing. An inner factory produces high-explosive shells, but when the fox "dies", the explosion is akin to an antigrain warhead going off.
ThingDef.label: shell fox

ThingDef.description: A small rusted canine. Its fur is fake and rough, but it can be used as steel if harvested.
ThingDef.label: steel fox

ThingDef.Name: NBF_StoneFox
ThingDef.description: A small stony fox. It somehow grows more of itself, even though it has never been seen eating.
A small wooden canine. Most of its nutriton comes from the leaves on its back, but it still requires some external food.
ThingDef.label: wooden fox
